imSidePanel
directive in module intermesh

Description

Create a slide in panel on the left.

Usage

as attribute
<im-side-panel im-side-panel
     is-active="{boolean}"
     title="{string}">
   ...
</im-side-panel>

Parameters

ParamTypeDetails
isActiveboolean

Expression that returns true when panel should activate.

titlestring

The panel title

Example

Source
